release.description: This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 6.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 6.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 5.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Upgraded Sawmill to the latest version (8.7.4.5).

release.description: This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 5.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 4.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 4.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Created installation and upgrade scripts to aid in the new installation and upgrade of the Sawmill software.
Included the configuration files for Sawmill that should be maintained, including the licenses, profiles, roles, users, ldap config, and others.

release.description: This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated releases 3.0.0 and 3.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Updated the LDAP configuration to handle LDAP groups and added a preferences configuration file.

release.description: This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Removed the parent project's Release Notes document. This document now serves as the single source for this component's release changes.

release.description: This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Cleaned up the documentation and removed the PDF generation feature.

release.description: This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 2.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.

This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 1.2.0 of the PDS4 System.This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Migrated this project to be a sub-project of the overall Report Service project.

release.description: This release of the Report Service is a component of the integrated releases 1.0.0 and 1.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This latest release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Provided the initial documentation covering installation and operation of the software.
